Title: Configure SSL to Use Strong Cipher Suites
DirectLink: Configure SSL to Use Strong Cipher Suites

Data:
==Applies To==

*ASP.NET

==What to Do==

Use the IISCrypto tool to configure the SSL/TLS cypher suites used by IIS.

==Why==

Choose strong SSL/TLS suites to avoid known vulnerabilities in SSL/TLS. Weak crypto suites are subject to crypto attacks which will decipher and compromise confidential data. 

==How==

Use the free //IISCrypto// tool to choose strong SSL/TLS cypher suites:

# **Download //IISCrypto//.** //IISCrypto// may be downloaded at the link at the bottom of this article. 
# **Run //IISCrypto//.** //IISCrypto// is easy to deploy and has a very simple interface. Download and run //IISCrypto//.
# **Chooose your desired compliance standard(s).** //IISCrypto// comes with presets based on common information security standards. Choose the ones that are the most applicable to your situation. In a couple of clicks, your IIS SSL/TLS cypher suites should be configured in compliance with the selected standards.

==Additional Resources==

* To download //IISCrypto//, see https://www.nartac.com/Products/IISCrypto/Default.aspx
